body_html:
Just like markusdr commented, update the pip using "pip install --upgrade pip", then you can check the pip version "pip2 --version", and then
"sudo pip2 install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow-0.5.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl", maybe it can worded.

body:
Just like markusdr commented, update the pip using "pip install --upgrade pip", then you can check the pip version "pip2 --version", and then 
"sudo pip2 install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow-0.5.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl", maybe it can worded.
